description:
Go climbing. Then climb some more. But when you're all "climbed out" don't worry about having to change, because the High Rock Pant for men is clean cut enough to accompany you to dinner too.

This pant delivers all the functionality you need from a climbing pant (such as oodles of storage, streamlined cinch, and more) but with a fine brushed twill finish and low profile features that introduce a new generation of climbing gear.
name: Prana High Rock Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
